descriptionHtml:
[color=#7CB9E8][size=5][b]INTRODUCTION:[/b][/size][/color][b]
This is an attempt to improve the Windhelm streetstone texture.

The textures were taken from the HD DLC and repeated 4 times to make the new one.The result is a texture twice the resolution as the HD DLC albeit smaller stone size. This is not the same as simple resizing. See the images for comparison.

The dirt texture in screenshots is from [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26269/?][b]Langleys Textures Workshop[/b][/url][b].



[/b][color=#7CB9E8][size=5][b]INSTALLATION:[/b][/size][/color][b]
Simply extract the contents of the zip to your Skyrim installation directory.



[/b][color=#7CB9E8][size=5][b]CREDITS:[/b][/size][/color][b]
Bethesda for Skyrim and HD DLC[/b]
author: navajothkk
